items.title: Join the Contact Center
items.deck: Share and learn with contact center practitioners.
items.summary: Explore methods of service delivery that improve customer experience in government contact centers.

list_1.terms: Government employees and contractors with an official .gov or .mil email are eligible to join.

community_list.title: Records management
community_list.summary: These communities of interest are for federal staff seeking to improve records management across the government.

community_list.title: Federal Information Security Educators (FISSEA)
community_list.summary: The organization, formerly known as the Federal Information Systems Security Educators Association (or FISSEA), serves as a professional forum for federal government information security professionals to assist agencies in strengthening their employee cybersecurity awareness and training programs. FISSEA also holds an annual conference.

community_list.title: Federal Evidence and Evaluation
community_list.summary: For federal executive branch staff interested in evaluation and evidence-building. Connect with peers, share information, access resources and trainings, and sign up for events. Features content to support federal agencies as they implement the Evidence Act.

community_list.title: Federal Program and Project Management (FedPM)
community_list.summary: The Federal Program and Project Management (FedPM) Community of Practice is the central source for the sharing of program and project management expertise across the entire federal government.

community_list.title: Mindful FED
community_list.summary: A community that offers guided meditations, team trainings, and curated digital resources for federal employees to boost mindfulness, and cultivate wellbeing and resilience in the workplace.

community_list.title: TechAcq
community_list.summary: IT acquisitions are at the heart of federal IT modernization efforts. They support agencies in delivering modern, digital services to the public more effectively and efficiently.

list_1.terms: Federal government employees only are eligible to join.

community_list.title: Join the Web Analytics
community_list.deck: Share and learn with web analytics and optimization practitioners.
community_list.summary: Make better decisions using web analytics and other optimization strategies.

list_1.terms: Government employees and contractors with an official .gov or .mil email are eligible to join.

community_list.title: Innovation Adoption
community_list.summary: Our purpose is to build innovation and intrapreneurship capacity across government by investing in and nurturing innovation, intrapreneurship capabilities, and the innovation experience.

list_1.terms: Federal government employees only are eligible to join.

community_list.title: Join the Communicators
community_list.deck: Share and learn with communications and public affairs practitioners.
community_list.summary: Improve written and verbal communication to make government more effective.

list_1.terms: Government employees and contractors with an official .gov or .mil email are eligible to join.

community_list.title: Federal Technology Investment Management
community_list.deck: Working to achieve greater government efficiency in the management of federal IT resources and assets.
community_list.summary: We share best practices and lessons learned to improve IT cost transparency across government.

list_1.terms: Open to any Federal employee or contractor with a .gov or .mil email address.

community_list.kicker: Join the Cloud and Infrastructure Community
community_list.title: Cloud and Infrastructure
community_list.deck: We connect data center and cloud colleagues to share insights and knowledge.
community_list.summary: A community for those who support their agency’s IT modernization efforts, and want to learn about application rationalization, data center optimization, and federal cloud computing.

list_1.terms: Open to anyone with a .gov or .mil email address.

community_list.title: Federal Leadership and Professional Development
community_list.deck: Providing federal employees with seminars on leadership, professional development, and strategy.
community_list.summary: Providing federal employees with seminars on leadership, professional development, and strategy.

list_1.terms: Anyone with a .gov or .mil email address is eligible to join

community_list.title: Artificial Intelligence (AI)
community_list.summary: Supporting and coordinating the use of artificial intelligence technologies in federal agencies.

list_1.terms: Only federal employees are eligible to join.

list_1.title: Join the Social Media
list_1.deck: Share and learn with social media practitioners.
list_1.summary: Improve social media outreach and performance.

list_1.terms: Government employees and contractors with an official .gov or .mil email are eligible to join.

community_list.title: Robotic Process Automation (RPA)
community_list.summary: A collaborative body designed to rapidly accelerate the adoption of Robotic Process Automation (RPA) technology across the federal government.

list_1.terms: Only federal employees are eligible to join.

community_list.title: U.S. Web Design System
community_list.deck: Making it easier to build accessible, mobile-friendly government websites for the public.
community_list.summary: A community for anyone building federal websites with the U.S. Web Design System (USWDS) or considering it for a future project.

community_list.title: Section 508 IT Accessibility
community_list.summary: To support people working to enhance access to federal information technology (IT), we identify and promote best practices for compliance with Section 508 law, and conformance to the Revised 508 Standards.

list_1.terms: U.S. government employees and U.S. educational institution employees are eligible to join.

community_list.title: OpenGov
community_list.summary: The Interagency Open Government Community of Practice is where we talk about transparency, open-participation, and collaboration across agencies.

community_list.title: Video Production Pros
community_list.summary: Video Production Pros brings together passionate storytellers, artists, social media experts, strategists, and video production experts from across the U.S. government.

list_1.terms: Anyone with a .gov or .mil email address is eligible to join.

community_list.title: Join the Plain Language
community_list.deck: Share and learn with plain language practitioners.
community_list.summary: Promote the use of plain language to provide better service to the public.

list_1.terms: Government employees and contractors with an official .gov or .mil email are eligible to join.

community_list.kicker: Join the Crowdsourcing and Citizen Science Community
community_list.title: Crowdsourcing and Citizen Science
community_list.summary: We work across government develop best practices for designing, implementing, and evaluating crowdsourcing and citizen science initiatives.

list_1.subscribe_email_body: enter your name + agency you work for

community_list.title: Customer Experience
community_list.summary: We are an interagency group of customer experience practitioners.

community_list.title: Open Data
community_list.summary: A community listserv and working group that unites 900 open data leads at federal agencies, data stewards, and all others in government interested in open data, enterprise data inventory, civic tech, and data-driven government issues.

community_list.title: Join the Multilingual
community_list.deck: Share and learn with multilingual practitioners.
community_list.summary: Expand and improve digital content in languages other than English.

list_1.terms: Government employees and contractors with an official .gov or .mil email are eligible to join.

community_list.title: Join the User Experience
community_list.deck: Share and learn with user experience and design practitioners.
community_list.summary: Create better user-centered products for the public.

list_1.terms: Government employees and contractors with an official .gov or .mil email are eligible to join.

community_list.title: Challenge & Prize
community_list.summary: We encourage public participation in crowdsourcing competitions to find innovative government solutions.

list_1.terms: Anyone with a .gov or .mil email address is eligible to join

community_list.title: Join the Web Managers
community_list.deck: Share and learn with web and digital services practitioners.
community_list.summary: Create a better online experience for the public alongside government web content managers.

list_1.terms: Government employees and contractors with an official .gov or .mil email are eligible to join.

community_list.title: Identity, Credential, and Access Management Subcommittee (ICAMSC)
community_list.summary: The Identity, Credential, and Access Management Subcommittee (ICAMSC) is the principal interagency forum for identity management, secure access, authentication, authorization, credentials, privileges, and access lifecycle management.

community_list.title: IT Buyers
community_list.summary: The Information Technology (IT) Buyers Community of Practice (ITB CoP) brings together acquisition programs, contract vehicle programs, and procurement specialists to create a community of federal IT buyers who share their experiences and scale their expertise across government.

community_list.title: DevOps
community_list.deck: Operating rapidly changing resilient systems at scale
community_list.summary: The practice of operations and development staff participating in the entire service lifecycle to operate rapidly changing resilient systems at scale.

community_list.title: Results-Oriented Accountability for Grants
community_list.summary: Our community engages stakeholders around the President’s Management Agenda (PMA), and the Results-Oriented Accountability for Grants Cross-Agency Priority (CAP) Goal.

list_1.subscribe_email_subject: Federal Join: Results-Oriented Accountability for Grants Community of Practice

list_2.subscribe_email_subject: Non-Federal Join: Results-Oriented Accountability for Grants Community of Practice

list_1.title: Application Programming Interfaces (APIs)
list_1.deck: Working to advance the cause of APIs in the federal government
list_1.summary: Working to advance the cause of APIs in the federal government.

list_1.title: Digital.gov Community Guidelines
list_1.deck: Ground rules to create a safe, inclusive, respectful, and welcoming environment
list_1.summary: GSA supports many communities of practice by hosting Listservs which provide our Digital.gov community with an easy way to collaborate, ask questions, and share information.
